title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, instead, I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a component or class within the project.
3. Press the F4 key.
